text: Harris Crushes Trump by 22% in Convention Speech Ratings  —  MUCH BIGGER  —  The former president—who angrily posted throughout Harris' Thursday night speech—lost badly in the ratings contest that matters so much to him.  —  Newly-released TV ratings for Kamala Harris' speech at the DNC will likely have Donald Trump seething.
